backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend for Concept Delta, including user profile management, test/question CRUD, test result submission and retrieval, and admin operations, with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that Navbar.tsx was updated to show conditional nav links (Home, Dashboard, Admin) based on authentication and admin status, with the navy/white theme.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark mode color tokens used by shadcn-ui components.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Concept Delta React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, dashboard, test, test result, and admin pages, and conditionally renders the ProfileSetupModal for authenticated users without a profile.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuestionGa: Admin panel component for uploading question images with a correct-answer selector and displaying/deleting existing questions in a gallery grid.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResultsTab: Admin tab that fetches and displays all student test results in a table, showing student name, test name, score, and submission date.
frontend/src/components/admin/TestBuilde: Admin form for creating a new test by entering a name and duration, then selecting questions from a visual grid of uploaded question images.
frontend/src/components/admin/TestManage: Admin table listing all tests with their duration, question count, publish status, and a toggle switch to publish or unpublish each test.
frontend/src/components/admin/UsersTab.t: Admin tab component that fetches and displays all registered users in a table with columns for name, principal, class, and contact number, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Route guard component that restricts access to admin pages, redirecting unauthenticated users to home, non-admins to dashboard, and admins who have already visited the admin panel back to dashboard with a toast notification.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky responsive navbar with the Concept Delta brand on the left and conditional nav links (Home, Dashboard, and Admin for admins only) plus a Login/Logout button on the right, styled in navy blue and white for both desktop and mobile menus.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's full name, class, and contact number, validates the inputs, and saves the profile via a mutation hook before navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: A route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to the home page and shows a spinner while the Internet Identity auth state is initializing.
frontend/src/components/TestCard.tsx: Displays a summary card for a single test (name, duration, question count) with a button that navigates to the test-taking route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Custom hook that fetches the currently authenticated caller's user profile from the backend actor using React Query, accounting for actor loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized collection of React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, published tests, test results, questions, and admin operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestTimer.ts: Custom hook that implements a countdown timer for tests, tracking remaining seconds, expiry state, formatted time string, and completion percentage.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Inter and Space Grotesk fonts, defining Tailwind CSS layers with CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and utility classes for gradients and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tab navigation for Question Gallery, Test Builder, Test Management, Users, and Results, gated behind an admin privilege check.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays the student dashboard with a welcome banner, stats bar (available tests, total questions, total duration), and a responsive grid of test cards fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showcasing MHT-CET mock test features, benefits, and CTAs to start practicing or join Telegram/YouTube channels.
frontend/src/pages/TestPage.tsx: Interactive test-taking page with a countdown timer, per-question navigation, answer selection, and auto/manual submission that redirects to the result page.
frontend/src/pages/TestResultPage.tsx: Displays the test result (score, percentage) after submission and prompts the user to join Telegram for explanations or return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with a navy color palette, custom fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk), navy box shadows, and accordion/fade-in animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project state (version 13) for 'Concept Delta', a responsive MHT-CET test series website, including architectural notes, existing features, and requirements for Home, Dashboard, Test, and Admin pages with Google/Internet Identity auth and a Navy Blue/White theme.
